title: Letztens erst vom hidden Gamemode erfahren

embed.title: r/leagueoflegends - My Lord! - the most fun new game mode you can have in Co-op vs A.I. without instalocking your 100% clean Yasuo main.
embed.description: Co-op vs A.I. is a strange, uncharted area of the League-osphere. But there's an even stranger new/ancient game mode that the Riot devs have hidden in every. single. patch. note. since. season. one. It's called MY LORD! It's simple. You grab 3 buddies and yourself.

body:
Hallo, fwiends uwu
hat jemadn Bock, das mit mir zu playen?
